title: (x) The Village at Colony Place logo - Bernhard Modern, Bodoni {Ken Messenger, Lex}
content:
Hi, all; I know this should be an easy one, but I can’t come up with the name of the face. I’m sure you folks will reply before my memory kicks in.

thanks!

Jason C

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ColonyPlace logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022337/http:/typophile.com/files/ColonyPlace%20logo.jpg) | 38 KB |

 [‹ (x) Stone Canyon stone carved lettering - similar to ITC Berkeley Oldstyle, Californian {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022337/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33510 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Various Italian headlines - Simoncini garamond, ITC Franklin Gothic, Joanna {Raph} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102022337/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33489 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jasonc

comments.content: Colony Place is Bernhard Modern bold.

“THE VILLAGE AT” is some cut of Bodoni with fake SC.

“Colony Place” is Bernhard Modern Bold.

“PLYMOUTH, MASSACHUSETTS” looks like ITC Garamond.

- Lex

EDIT: Actually, the ’T’ is wrong for ITC Garamond.
